title: American Horror Story 8: Apocalypse // Promo: Hat
author: American Horror Story 10
comment:
We invoke thee
 Queen of queens
 A-ra-d-ia A-ra-d-ia
 Come to us
Was that the witch hat from Coven????
Sounds like Lady Gaga and Sarah Paulson which are 2 supreme witches chanting. The last teaser looked liked Gaga as well. I am hoping she is in. AHS Apocalypse is going to be awesome.

It sounds like Sarah Paulson (towards the end you can tell it's not Gaga, it's Paulson), so it's probably either Paulson's character Cordelia and or Venable with others chanting along for a summoning ritual. I hear something in the chant that goes, "we invoke the queen of queens" followed by the deities name said twice like in the rest of the video.
